text: Tadeusz Ferenc (10 February 1940 – 27 August 2022) was a Polish economist and politician. He was a member of Sejm from 2001 to 2002. He was the mayor of Rzeszów from 2002 until his death. Ferenc died on 27 August 2022, at the age of 82. == References == Category:1940 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Polish economists Category:Polish politicians
title: Tadeusz Ferenc
